In his remarks at the 2022 Mackinac Policy Conference, #Pistons Vice chairman Arn Tellem made an emotional appeal for society to address gun violence.

@AlabamaScribe56 article 🗞: https://t.co/Y0hkiU48kn | #BeImpactful

58% of American adults or someone they care for have experienced gun violence in their lifetime. We ALL must come together to work for change. Engage your local & national representatives on common-sense gun safety legislation at the state & federal level. https://t.co/lrCnZJ93RX

Gun suicide claims the lives of nearly 24,000 people in America every year. There are more than 1,200 child and teen firearm suicides per year. Disrupting access to guns in times of crisis can save lives. 

@everytown | https://t.co/SU7igIJuBv https://t.co/ujA3LKZF44

Gun violence IS a women’s issue. Every month, an average of 70 women are shot and killed by an intimate partner. BIPOC women are disproportionately impacted.

@everytown | https://t.co/SU7igIJuBv https://t.co/JQxxQoNekY

Important gun safety information from the @DetroitPolice Department: 

🔹 You can get a free gun lock from your local precinct
🔹 Unregistered and unlawfully obtained firearms are illegal
🔹 Store your gun out of reach from unauthorized users https://t.co/bqbqy53M95

Gun violence is taking a toll on Black and Latinx people in the United States. Black Americans make up the majority of gun homicide victims and are 10X more likely than white Americans to die by gun homicide.

@everytown | https://t.co/SU7igIJuBv https://t.co/9OaxxneGcl

Every day, more than 110 people in the United States are killed with guns and more than 200 are shot and wounded. 

@everytown https://t.co/SU7igIJuBv

Did you know that you can obtain a free gun safety kit and free gun trigger lock in all 83 counties in Michigan through @projchildsafe? 

Project SafeChild is a nationwide program by the @NSSF.

Learn more: https://t.co/Fi0UID3h9l

By choosing to keep a firearm in your home, you are legally responsible for ensuring that the weapon is stored in a safe manner, and not easily accessible to children or unauthorized persons.

More on Michigan's Firearms laws available via @migovernment: https://t.co/bMrHY7oJeT

Each year in the US, hundreds of children are accidentally injured and/or killed by firearms that are not properly secured. 

In Michigan, an average of 89 children & teens die by guns every year. 52% of these deaths are homicides.

More via @migovernment: https://t.co/bMrHY7oJeT
